messages.subject: Re: the takagis
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know if its ok to bring up old posts but I read about the Takagi family here http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ/message/1750 and the FILES section go
messages.messageBody:
I don't know if its ok to bring up old posts but I read about the
Takagi family here http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ/message/1750

and the "FILES" section go to the folder "Saitou Hajime Info"
Translations and click on the first file it has stuff on the family,
Tokio and her brother.

sorry if it is not allowed to go back this far to reply to a post.

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, shinsengumi3@a... wrote:
> I posted this on LJ and got absolutely no response, much like my
other two
> posts there, so perhaps someone here could help me? What I'm looking
for is
> reliable information on the Takagi family. Anything you've got, I'd
like to hear.
> Names (I've seen inconsistent information on just Tokio's brother's
name for
> crying out loud), dates, importance, etc, etc. Please. With sugar on
top. Thank
> you.
>
> ~Sarah
>

messages.messageBody:
Hi!

I missed the following stuff - haven't had time to check this e-mail in a little while. Could someone please mail those pics to me, or send them to my streamload (enma_o) or something?

Linda

sherlgirl <sherlgirl@...> wrote:

From PMK
http://www.sherlgirl.com/temp/miscpmk/

I put up some images from the TV Animation Starter Book and the map from the "Edo Oboegaki" book.

Those of you with websites, please do not direct link, but instead d/l and upload at your sites.

I will likely take it down within a week.

If you need the ISBN numbers and stuff... let me know.

S

messages.subject: the takagis
messages.msgSnippet: I posted this on LJ and got absolutely no response, much like my other two posts there, so perhaps someone here could help me? What I m looking for is reliable
messages.messageBody:
I posted this on LJ and got absolutely no response, much like my other two
posts there, so perhaps someone here could help me? What I'm looking for is
reliable information on the Takagi family. Anything you've got, I'd like to hear.
Names (I've seen inconsistent information on just Tokio's brother's name for
crying out loud), dates, importance, etc, etc. Please. With sugar on top. Thank
you.

~Sarah


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
